item.title: A Brief History of Me Being a Nerd | By Von Miller
item.description:
A Brief History of Me Being a Nerd | By Von Miller

Let me tell you about a little spy operation my mom and I used to run. When I was in fifth grade, I wanted to play peewee football so bad. So I went up to my dad after school and told him he had to go sign me up.

item.title: Texas A&M men's basketball team beats Ole Miss to end SEC skid
item.description:
Texas A&M men's basketball team beats Ole Miss to end SEC skid

Posted: It was Throwback Night at Reed Arena, but the Aggies were only wanting to turn the clock back a couple of weeks. The Texas A&M men's basketball team, in need a of a victory after five straight Southeastern Conference losses, got it by putting away Ole Miss 71-56 on Tuesday.

item.title: Kentucky vs Texas A&M Gets ESPN College Gameday
item.description:
Kentucky vs Texas A&M Gets ESPN College Gameday

It's a big event anytime Kentucky comes to town, so it's no surprise they'll once again be part of ESPN College Gameday. The Kentucky Wildcats appear to have solved their road woes just in time for next week's big matchup with the 13th-ranked (for now) Texas A&M Aggies.

item.title: Aggies drop fourth straight with loss at LSU
item.description:
Aggies drop fourth straight with loss at LSU

Texas A&M basketball had a lot going against it on Saturday at LSU. Though he did play, senior star Jalen Jones was out of the starting lineup with a hip pointer. Senior point guard Anthony Collins gave it a go for a couple minutes but left the game in the first couple minutes with a stomach bug.

item.title: Steve Greene Introduced as Head Volleyball Coach - Congrats Buddy!
item.description:
Steve Greene Introduced as Head Volleyball Coach - Congrats Buddy!

Greene comes to the Island after spending the past six seasons as an assistant coach at Texas A&M. While with the Aggies he primarily worked with the setters and served as the program's recruiting coordinator. With Greene on staff, the Aggies have advanced to the NCAA Tournament every year and surpassed the 20-win plateau four times.

item.title: Recapping Texas A&M's national signing day
item.description:
Recapping Texas A&M's national signing day

Feb 11, 2016 Sam Khan Jr.ESPN Staff Writer Close Covers Texas A&M and the SEC. Joined ESPN in 2012. Graduate of the University of Houston. All week we've been taking a closer look at how each SEC team fared on national signing day.

item.title: Texas A&M approaches d-line coach Brick Haley about joining Aggies | Hookem.com
item.description:
Texas A&M approaches d-line coach Brick Haley about joining Aggies | Hookem.com

Charlie Strong may not be done with his coaching turnover. On Friday, beat reporter Brian Davis learned that Texas A&M head coach Kevin Sumlin has approached Texas defensive line coach Brick Haley about joining the Aggie staff, according to a source close to the situation.

item.title: Here's the complete list of players invited to the 2016 NFL Combine, led by 14 from Ohio State
item.description:
Here's the complete list of players invited to the 2016 NFL Combine, led by 14 from Ohio State

More than 300 players looking to fulfill their dream of playing in the NFL will be on hand for the Combine Feb. 23-29 in Indianapolis. The NFL released the complete list of players invited to the 2016 Scouting Combine on Thursday, with a total of 332 prospects expected to attend the annual event from Feb.

item.title: With Texas A&M football staff, what's old is good again
item.description:
With Texas A&M football staff, what's old is good again

Reports are surfacing that Texas A&M coach Kevin Sumlin is bringing back a former Aggie assistant who worked for the last head coach...

item.title: Alabama hands Texas A&M 4th straight SEC loss
item.description:
Alabama hands Texas A&M 4th straight SEC loss

The past two weeks of Texas A&M basketball, losers of four consecutive SEC games, can be summed up by a pair of free-throw attempts, or more accurately, a pair of missed free throws. Aggies senior guard Anthony Collins, the SEC's most accurate free-throw shooter at 93.8%, had missed just two of his first 32 free throw attempts this season.
